original_text: And fear came on all their neighbors. And all these things were talked about through all the hill country of Judea,
korean_text: 그 근처에 사는 자가 다 두려워하고 이 모든 말이 온 유대 산골에 두루 퍼지매

sentences.original_text: And fear came on all their neighbors.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 두려움이 그들의 모든 이웃에게 임했습니다.

sentences.original_text: And all these things were talked about
through all the hill country of Judea
